Name: Balm
Description: Soothes and calms nerves and emotions.

Name: Constricting
Description: Impairing or immobilizing the wearer by pinning limbs against body.

Name: Cowing
Description: Causes the listed type of creatures to submit more easily to the wearer's wishes by intimidation.

Name: Fortified
Description: Acts as armor or aegis of the specified type.

Name: Gallium
Description: Soft, tough, silvery liquid metal weave that hardens in the cold.

Name: Hesychastic
Description: Dampens or quietens sounds underneath items with this quality.

Name: Lithe
Description: So unencumbering that is does not require an equipment slot.

Name: Living
Description: Repairs itself under certain conditions, like exposure to sunshine or water. If no speed is given, it does it slowly.

Name: Magic
Description: Cannot be harmed by non-magical means.

Name: Obfuscate
Description: Good at hiding what's underneath, so long as it's fully covered.

Name: Profane
Description: Unhallowed, reeking of sin to those attuned to such scents, like common animals and young children.

Name: Repellent
Description: Entities of the specified nature do not willingly approach closer than a short distance, and if they're reasonably light gravity can't generally make them either.

Name: Rigidulous
Description: Only moves with force, not with momentum.

Name: Sapiential
Description: Said to provide wisdom. Third-eye stimulating.

Name: Sharded
Description: Made of painstakingly connected or mounted hard pieces, like steel, mother of pearl, or obsidian. Functions as the armor indicated, but only takes half the usual slots, and looks killer.

Name: Uniform
Description: Forms or is part of a uniform, a recognizable outfit of a defined group, for good or ill.
